definition: native soil/one's native land/one's hometown/local (to an area)
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: Chapter II is mainly about the role of the local history in high school history teaching.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，主要講述鄉土史在高中歷史教學中的作用。

sentences.english: It is also the real response of local architecture of Chu.
sentences.chinese: 雖浮想聯翩，亦不失爲楚鄉土建築實狀的反映。

sentences.english: The emphasis should be put on %Artemisia% and %Caragana% genera when native sand binding plants are to be selected.
sentences.chinese: 選擇鄉土固沙植物應將重點放在蒿屬和錦雞兒屬上。

sentences.english: The vernacular bamboo construction techniques are attributed to migrants from rural Guanxi.
sentences.chinese: 鄉土風格的竹結構建造技術是移植於廣西的鄉村。

sentences.english: The style of natural guileless, show a long time ago agrestic breath.
sentences.chinese: 自然樸實的格調，顯示出悠遠的鄉土氣息。

sentences.english: Prophetic intellects began to think of themodernization of country China.
sentences.chinese: 先知先覺的知識分子開始了鄉土中國現代化的思考。

sentences.english: Neo-Vernacular is one of the architectural tendencies in the diversified world on contemporary.
sentences.chinese: 新鄉土建築是當代多元化世界的一種建築傾向。

sentences.english: There are many well-grown native flora on campus.
sentences.chinese: 南寧市高校校園內較多地使用鄉土樹種，長勢良好。

sentences.english: Village Regulations and Agreements are the community public specifications which graft modern democracy onto rural characters.
sentences.chinese: 是融鄉土性與現代民主於一體的的社區公共規範。

sentences.english: Castanopsis hystrix is one of the important planting tree species of south subtropical evergreen broad-leaved forest.
sentences.chinese: 紅錐是南亞熱帶地區優良的珍貴鄉土闊葉造林樹種。

sentences.english: The attitude of this project is consistent with green building and new vernacular architecture.
sentences.chinese: 這和綠色建築以及新鄉土建築的思路也是吻合的。

sentences.english: The rural element was one of the most important factor which made Huai-Bloc strong in military and weak in politics.
sentences.chinese: 鄉土因素成爲淮系集團呈現軍強政弱特點的原因之一。

sentences.english: Classical beauty of local idyll has covered modern beauty in urban.
sentences.chinese: 鄉土田園的古典美已構成對都市現代美的遮蔽。

sentences.english: Xu graduated from the Normal, is a version with a local flavor approaching artists.
sentences.chinese: 年畢業於徐師大，是一位帶着鄉土氣息走來的版畫家。

sentences.english: All the songs are sung by local artists, not in the way the star folklores are sung.
sentences.chinese: 每一首歌都是跟本來鄉土原來的唱法那樣唱的。

sentences.english: Folk art, an agrestic art, is the mother of all types of art.
sentences.chinese: 摘要民間美術是鄉土藝術，是一切美術的母體。

definition: implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
in touch with the common people/down-to-earth
